Header: A sluice gate of Udawalawa reservoir opened.
Content: A sluice gate of Udawalawareservoir has been opened. The water capacity of Udawalawa reservoir is 217,000 acre feet. At present it has increased to 218,483 acre feet. Therefore, one sluice gate of the reservoir has been opened. Engineer in Charge of the Udawalawa reservoir has requested the people in low lying areas to be vigilant.
